divs: Sighting DetailsOn Saturday, April 29th,2000 at around 10:30pm during a birthday gathering at myparents house next to Iroquois park, we were outside in the yard sitting andtalking when I caught site of a bright white light(star-like) in the north skyhigh on the horizon. It moved straight east, southeast about the length of 12(ifholding a ruler at arms length) then the intensity brightened as it moved andafter only about 10 seconds of its flight it started to fade and completelyestinguished itself leaving nothing but empty clear sky. Also, On Monday,October 2nd, 2000 at around 8:00pm (twilight time) I was sitting on my frontporch enjoying the calm clear night and looking up into the sky when suddenly abright white star-like object caught my eye. It was in the east sky, about 60degrees on the horizon. it became very bright and stayed stationary, then after5 seconds it suddenly faded quickly and disappeared leaving a clear sky. Noblinking plane lights were seen in the vicinity near this light.
Summary: intense white star-like object appear and disappea
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around April 29th 2000
